items.sentence: I hope you're able to resolve the situation soon.
When I was a kid, I used to often play by myself.
I didn't eat any of the cookies Tom baked for me.
I thought Tom would want to work on the plumbing.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was a good cook.
Tom told me he thought that Mary had been unfair.
Tom only studies about half as much as Mary does.
Things are a lot more complicated than they look.
Tom hasn't been seen in public since he resigned.
There are more than 50,000 books in this library.
